snippet: Ty Hensley, the Yankees’ top draft pick in 2012, was hospitalized on Dec. 28 after an assault, but he is recovering and should be ready for spring training.
abstract: New York Yankees pitching prospect Ty Hensley is hospitalized after being assaulted by former college football player Anthony David Moarales in The Village, Okla.
lead_paragraph: Ty Hensley, the Yankees’ top draft pick in 2012, was hospitalized on Dec. 28 after an assault, but he is recovering and should be ready for spring training.

headline.main: Ty Hensley, a Top Yankees Prospect, Is Left With Broken Jaw After Altercation
headline.print_headline: Yanks Prospect Is Left With Broken Jaw After Altercation
